issue.title: [Java] Implement an immutable table object
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17883](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17883). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement an immutable Table object without the batch semantics provided by VectorSchemaRoot. 

See original design document/discussion here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1J77irZFWNnSID7vK71z26Nw_Pi99I9Hb9iryno8B03c/edit?usp=sharing

Note that this ticket covers only the immutable Table implementation.
